insert into fmea_milestone_time (fmea_plan_start_time, fmea_content_start_time, fmea_analysis_finsh_date, fmea_action_finsh_date, fmea_id) values (#{fmeaPlanStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmeaContentStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmeaAnalysisFinshDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmeaActionFinshDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmeaId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update fmea_milestone_time set fmea_plan_start_time = #{fmeaPlanStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fmea_content_start_time = #{fmeaContentStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fmea_analysis_finsh_date = #{fmeaAnalysisFinshDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fmea_action_finsh_date = #{fmeaActionFinshDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fmea_id = #{fmeaId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, fmea_plan_start_time, fmea_content_start_time, fmea_analysis_finsh_date, fmea_action_finsh_date, fmea_id from fmea_milestone_time where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
